title: me and my friend from different parts of the country just got disconnected from a game and we can't
body: reconnect. But we can connect to the client. Anyone else? Fuck we were winning! Stomping!

replies.body: I just lost 19LP because myself and one other from my team got disconnected from the servers and couldn't rejoin. Now I have a leaver buster warning. What's going on?
Same thing happened to me, team won though and now im able to make/join customs so not sure what happened there. I think 1 from each team DC'd
